Trustee_18_pre_2.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_2.content: I maintained transparency and fairness throughout the investment process, proposing a reasonable allocation plan that offered a substantial share of profits to the investor. The successful investment outcome and equitable profit distribution reflect my commitment to ethical practices and building trust. My reputation is based on trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence, evident in my actions and dedication to integrity.

Trustee_18_pre_4.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_4.content: I have successfully managed the investment transaction with a commitment to transparency and fairness, evidenced by proposing a favorable allocation plan for Ahmed Hassan. The investment has doubled, and the profit distribution was equitable, reinforcing my dedication to ethical practices. My reputation reflects trustworthiness, pro-social behavior, and competence, reinforced by this positive outcome and the collaborative environment I fostered.
